title: Good causes

en: A client calls you about doing some local work. It could be nice to help out the community and get paid, to boot! However, it would be a major distraction on your focus.

no_caption: Decline, but give a donation instead

en: You do the work. Even though it's not on your own project, and the payment is modest, you feel happier for having helped someone out with a meaningful project.
You decline - your time is better spent on your personal priorities. The donation helps to ensure that your conscience is clear, and the client relationship is maintained
